T02TD3277E:26a-1: ha ya gr'i ba s'a dha nam /
T02TD3277E:26a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD3277E:26a-5: nyi ma la yi ge ham dmar po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa las 'phags pa rta mgrin te /
T02TD3277E:26a-6: sku mdog dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02TD3277E:26a-7: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni mthing nag dang dkar po ste /
T02TD3277E:26a-8: zhal so so zhing spyan gsum pa'o //
T02TD3277E:26a-9: sprul gyi rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02TD3277E:26a-10: zhabs brgyang bskum gyis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3277E:26a-11: khro bo'i lta stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa /
T02TD3277E:26a-12: zhal dang po ni 'dzum pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3277E:26b-0: zhal g-yas pa ni ljags 'dril bar mdzad @26b pa'o //
T02TD3277E:26b-1: zhal g-yon pa ni mche bas ao ma gtsigs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3277E:26b-2: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnams pa /
T02TD3277E:26b-3: g-yas pa'i phyag bzhin rdo rje dang /
T02TD3277E:26b-5: ba dan rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang mda' gdeng ba'o //
T02TD3277E:26b-6: g-yon pa'i phyag bzhi ni sdigs mdzub dang nyid kyi dkur brten pa dang /
T02TD3277E:26b-8: mi bskyod pa cod pan la bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD3277E:26b-9: rta mchog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD3277E:26b-10: bzlas pa'i sngags ni aom ham ha ya gri ba sv'a h'a /
T02TD3277E:26b-11: rta mgrin gyis grub thabs so /
T02TD3277E:26b-13: // / aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
